Answer 3:

Answer 4:
```{r}

  group_by(Beverage_category) %>% 
  summarise(mean(Calories)) %>% 
gr
```
```{r}

  group_by(Beverage_category) %>%
  summarise(mean_calories = mean(Calories)) %>%

  head(3)
most_calories
```
